expo.name: SobAi

infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: We need access to your health data to track your fitness progress and provide personalized insights.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: We need permission to update your health data to keep your fitness records up to date.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location to find NA and AA meetings near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need your location to find NA and AA meetings near you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to allow you to take profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your photo library to allow you to select profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow SobAi to use your location to find NA and AA meetings near you.

expo.description: SobAi is your personal sober companion, helping you stay on track with your recovery journey through daily motivation, community support, and personalized insights.
